main event: Observations of a pale, shining, elliptical object in the Fresno area reported by multiple civilians on September 6, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were observed moving slowly on a horizontal course and producing trails., A weather observer dismissed the sightings as normal air traffic phenomena., There were multiple uncorroborated eyewitness accounts., The objects appeared to change brightness and speed during the observation., Observers noted no sound from the phenomenon.
witness description: Multiple civilians with no specific names provided
